page.title: 19VILLAGE TRANSPORT:IRCHESTER
page.content: 321 Irchester residents were asked: "What method of transport do you most often use?" 0.6% used trains for leisure. 7.1% used buses for work and shopping. 58.2% used cars for work shopping and leisure equally. 4.3% used motorcycles for work. 4.3% used bicycles for work & leisure. 25.2% walked to work, shops and for leisure. Another question asked was: "How often do you use a bus?"(poll 224) Often 8.4% sometimes 9.3% rarely 39.2% never 25% used for shopping 51.5% used in emergency(when no other transport available) 39%. Main reasons for not using buses: Buses come at unsuitable times 30%. Buses not frequent enough 32%. Do not or cannot leave village 25%. Most do not travel more than 20mls du- ring the week or 50mls at the weekend.
